con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://www.ebayopensource.org/turmeric/security/v1/services"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:isRateLimitedRequest> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<ser:resourceName>checkout</ser:resourceName> <ser:operationName>PaymentService</ser:operationName> <ser:resourceType>SERVICE</ser:resourceType> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ser:subject> <ser:domain>USER</ser:domain> <ser:value>101.10.2.1</ser:value> </ser:subject>
</ser:isRateLimitedRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>resource name to be rate limited</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="operationName" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>operation name to be rate limited</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="resourceType" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>resource type: e.g SERVICE</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="BaseRateLimiterServiceResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Base response container for all service operations in RateLimiter Service.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseResponse"></xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="isRateLimitedRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains all the information which related to rate limiting</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <Summary>if the requested subject/subjectGroup has been rate limited for the resource/operation</Summary> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseRateLimiterServiceRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="subject" type="tns:SubjectType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains subject information for rate limiting request</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="resolvedSubjectGroup" type="tns:SubjectGroupType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains subject groups which has group membership resolved</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Always</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="challengeAnswer" type="tns:ChallengeAnswer" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains information for challenge answer</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="attr" type="tns:NameValuePair" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains addition information to do rate limiter</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="isRateLimitedResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains information of rate limiter status, or challenge information if the status is "Challenge"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseRateLimiterServiceResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="tns:RateLimiterStatus" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>status of the Rate limiting</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Always</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="resolvedSubjectGroup" type="tns:SubjectGroupType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains subject group list which has group membership resolved.</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="challenge" type="tns:Challenge" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains information for answering challenge question. Returned only if status is SERVE_GIF</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="RateLimiterStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>return the Rate Limiter Status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SERVE_OK"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>No Block from Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FLAG"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Flaged by Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SERVE_GIF"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Server Gif by Rate Limiter, to continue the call, the caller need to resolved the Challenge question</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BLOCK"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Block by Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SOFT_LIMIT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Soft limit by Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UNSUPPORTED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unsupported by Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestHasBeenServed"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request Has Been Served by Rate Limiter</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Invalid"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Invalid</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="SubjectType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains subject type information. e.g. IP, EBAYAPP</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="domain" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>subject domain information e.g EBAYAPP, IP, etc</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>value of the subject e.g 10.12.13 for IP</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>Yes</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SubjectGroupType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains subject group type information. e.g. IP, EBAYAPP</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="domain" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>subject group domain information e.g EBAYAPP, IP, etc</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>subject group name</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="calculator" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>calculator's name if a subject group is calculated subject group</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="isRateLimitedRequest" nillable="true" type="tns:isRateLimitedRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>request to make isRateLimited call</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="isRateLimitedResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:isRateLimitedResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>response of calling isRateLimited call</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="NameValuePair"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains additional information to rate limting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>attribute name e.g. sec</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>attribute value e.g sec=1 -> attr name:sec attr value:1</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ChallengeAnswer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains caller's Challenge answer information</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="token" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>token which returned by previous isRatelimited response</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="userInput" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>text string contains user's input which he has seen from the image from previouse isRateLimited response</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <RequiredInput>No</RequiredInput> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Challenge"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>contains Challenge information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="token" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>encoded string</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tokenURL" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>URL which contains token's image</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <CallInfo> <CallName>isRateLimited</CallName> <Returned>Conditionally</Returned> </CallInfo> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </ser:isRateLimitedRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
